Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory200.png'}
{3: "December 15th, 10 minutes after Gestalt's data wall was opened."}
{3: "The chaos in Babylonia hasn't affected the surface yet. Lamia appears before Luna with a small bag of milk cookies after being away for more than half a year."}
{3: "She timidly peeks out of the corner at Alpha, who is standing beside Luna. She can't decide if she should offer the cookies in her hand."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "I've learned a little more about the re-filtering process, but I'll need your help.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Have you figured something out? That's great, I'll help!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "After the Red Tide appeared, I've been feeling an irregular pull whenever I use the power of Punishing.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Luna', 3: '...That feeling comes from those who died in the Red Tide. I used to dismiss the pulls as noise, but while the static in my mind faded with my diminishing permissions, the voices of the Red Tide remained clear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If that's the case, I'll put them to use. I will embrace all of the hatred these consciousnesses harbor against agents.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "That's too dangerous, Miss Luna! If you can't maintain your sense of self, they'll tear your consciousness apart!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'When I first saw the egg in the ocean depths, I saw a future... where I was controlled by the egg and turned into her puppet...!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Staying here will only lead us to the same fate.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Is there really no other way?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'The fading voices have been showing me another future... They want me to find my lost hatred.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Intense emotions can indeed achieve similar results, but to create lasting hatred...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl closes her eyes. She does not want to speak of the crimson nightmare.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I've found a way to channel these people's consciousnesses into myself after careful experiments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I must head to where the Red Tide converges, but first, I need to break free from this place.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "But you've failed so many times before.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'That\'s because I was still trapped by the static noises. Every time I tried to break free, "she" would pin me down again.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's been growing more distant in the past few months... I can feel she's lost her patience. She is no longer willing to honor my constraints. She'll eventually abandon me when she leaves, and I'll become a Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "This is our only chance. When she leaves, I'll break free and head to where the Red Tide converges.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna raises her head. She looks at the exit that has been out of reach for so long.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "As for what's next... After breaking free...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Luna's voice grows fainter."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Now seems to be the right time.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: "She closes her eyes and sinks once more into that crimson nightmare—but this time, she's not just resisting. This time, she will break free."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory916.jpg'}
{3: 'Luna jolts awake, gasping for air like someone drowning breaking the surface.'}
{3: 'She presses her curled fingers and palm against her forehead with such force that she might squeeze something out of her mind.'}
{3: "But it's no use—the nightmares remain deeply entangled with her memories."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The sparks from the clashing chakram and swords, the feeling of curved edges splitting flesh and severing bones, the thud of falling corpses, and the glaring color of vital fluid...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{3: 'She takes several deep breaths with her eyes closed, and opens them after regaining her usual composure.'}
{3: 'She surveys her surroundings.'}
{3: 'A murky sky veiled in thick fog hangs above floating, shattered streets. Punishing aggregates twist into the ground like tangled roots, while faint static whispers echo...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'This is... the data space of the Ascension-Network...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna is familiar with the data space of the Ascension-Network. She can recognize it even though the scenery changes between each visit.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I shall end it all here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'That was the final straw. The Ascension-Network should have abandoned her when she refused and sever their connection—making it impossible for her consciousness to stay in the data space...'}

{3: "Luna carefully probes her connection and discovers that the Ascension-Network hasn't revoked all of her access. It has left a tiny fraction. The remaining access, along with the network's commands, acts like a pin, firmly anchoring her consciousness within the data space."}
{3: 'The Ascension-Network certainly has its reasons for doing this, and Luna is all too aware of them.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I might just have one last bit of value for the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{3: "This is an agent's consciousness, after all—it is better to let it become nutrients for the Ascension-Network than to rot away outside."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I need to find a way out of here quickly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna turns her gaze to the "Corrupted" lingering in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Punishing Creation', 3: 'SCREEEEE—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Punishing Mimicry', 3: 'GRRR—GRRR—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'These aren\'t Corrupted. They\'re "monsters" stitched together from countless fragments of consciousness data.'}
{3: "The aggregate of the living's consciousnesses now exist in the form of their own murderers..."}
{3: 'They may seem harmless now, but eventually they will find Luna—an "anomaly" with intact consciousness. Once they find the target, they will hunt her until she is torn apart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'These things are not a problem, but the crucial thing is...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna looks toward the area with the highest concentration of Punishing in the space.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A gray and white figure should have been standing there.'}
{3: 'But now it is empty.'}
{3: 'Luna whispers the name that belongs to the static noises. Roland started calling her "Selene" when she began to drift away.'}
{3: 'She knows from her senses that the puppet who has inherited her authority and remained loyal to the Ascension-Network has already left.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Time is running out. This is our only chance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'The Ascension-Network is trapping my consciousness here. It must be using the Punishing crystals that bind me in the physical world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If I can find the nail holding my consciousness in this data space and destroy them, the Punishing crystals binding me in reality will shatter as well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna closes her eyes to focus her senses and to locate the general direction of the "nail" binding her consciousness.'}
{3: 'Luna discovers something else during her exploration while searching for her target.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Something's off with the Ascension-Network. The data flow is too fast, and the whole system seems... tense?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With her permission, she cannot sense anything more.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...I must stay on high alert.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna sets off toward her newly discovered target.'}
